message: Dear customer, your eSewa account has been locked. Please share OTP code to unlock. Call 9801234567 immediately.
Urgent! Your Khalti wallet will be blocked. Share the verification code we sent to verify your identity.
Tapaiko eSewa account ma suspicious activity detect bhayo. OTP code pathau natra account band huncha.
This is NIC Asia Bank. Your account shows unauthorized transaction. Please provide OTP to block the transaction.
Nepal Bank Limited here. Your debit card has been blocked. Share OTP received on your phone to reactivate.
Hacked! Someone trying to access my account from this number. They knew my details!
Congratulations! You won Rs 500,000 in Ncell lucky draw. Send Rs 5,000 processing fee to claim your prize.
Tapai Nepal Telecom ko lucky winner ho! Rs 10 lakh jitnu bhayo. Processing ko lagi Rs 3000 pathaunus.
You are selected for Amazon gift card Rs 50,000. Click link and pay Rs 500 delivery charge.
Congratulations! You are selected for Government Job in Ministry. Pay Rs 50,000 for document processing.
Dubai ma job ko lagi select bhanu bhayo. Visa processing ko lagi Rs 80,000 deposit garnu parcha.
Work from home opportunity! Earn Rs 50,000 monthly. Registration fee Rs 10,000 required.
Prabhu Bank security department. Suspicious login detected. Reply with your ATM PIN to secure account.
This is Nabil Bank fraud department. Someone withdrew money. Share OTP to reverse transaction.
eSewa security alert! Rs 25,000 transaction pending. Cancel garna OTP code pathaunus immediately.
Khalti wallet ma Rs 50,000 credit bhayo. Claim garna yo link ma click garera OTP haalnus.
Dear user, your mobile banking OTP is 847392. Do not share with anyone. Valid for 5 minutes.
Hello sir, meeting ko lagi 3 pm ma office aaunu hola. Documents liyera aaunus.
KBC Nepal ko winner! Amitabh Bachchan le announce garnu bhayo. Rs 1 crore claim garna 9878901234 call garnus.
Facebook lottery winner selected! Mark Zuckerberg personally chose you. Pay $100 processing to get $500,000.
Online data entry job. Daily 2-3 hours work, earn Rs 25,000 monthly. Registration Rs 5,000 only.
Malaysia construction company hiring. Salary Rs 60,000. Agent fee Rs 1,50,000 advance needed.
Sanima Bank urgent notice. Your account compromised. Visit branch with photocopy of citizenship and ATM card immediately.
Hi, this is from Nepal SBI Bank. Your loan application has been approved. Visit our branch for documentation.
URGENT! Tapaiko IME Pay account hack hunu lagi raicha. OTP code immediately pathaunus to secure account.
Someone transferred Rs 75,000 from your eSewa. Cancel transaction by sharing OTP within 10 minutes.
Daraz anniversary mega sale winner! Tapai Rs 2 lakh shopping voucher jitnu bhayo. Claim fee Rs 1,000.
Netflix 1 year free subscription winner! Pay Rs 500 activation fee to customer care number.
USA student visa with work permit. Guaranteed approval. Pay Rs 3,00,000 processing fee. Limited slots!
Qatar Airways cabin crew recruitment. Salary $2000. Training fee $1500 advance payment required.
Global IME Bank KYC update mandatory. Share PAN number, citizenship number and OTP to avoid account suspension.
Everest Bank security check. Your card details need verification. Reply with card number and CVV.
Khalti cashback offer! Rs 10,000 credit upcoming. Activate garna login credentials email ma pathaunus.
ConnectIPS payment verification needed. Share 6-digit OTP received from your bank to complete Rs 45,000 transfer.
Not me! This number called pretending to be my son. Asked for urgent money transfer. Total scam!
I'm from Nepal Police Cyber Bureau. Investigating this number for multiple fraud cases. Do not engage!
PUBG mobile 10,000 UC free! Nepal server winner announcement. Download APK and enter phone number to claim.
Free Fire diamonds giveaway scam! They ask for Google Play redeem codes. Blocked them.
Government teacher vacancy Lok Sewa Aayog. Guaranteed selection Rs 8 lakh. Interview waived. Pay now!
Foreign employment license ready. Japan factory worker visa approved. Final payment Rs 2,50,000 within 2 days.
Your SIM card will be blocked by NTC. Reactivation OTP verify garnus immediately. Contact 9809999999.
Ncell prepaid number deactivate huncha. Verification code pathayeko cha SMS ma. 30 min bhitra reply garnus.
NMB Bank credit card approval! Rs 5 lakh limit. Delivery fee Rs 2,000 advance. Call 9810000000 immediately.
eSewa refund process initiated Rs 15,000. Bank details verify garna OTP share garnus within 1 hour.
COVID-19 government compensation Rs 50,000 per family. Apply now! Registration fee Rs 500 via eSewa/Khalti.
PM employment program selected candidate. Rs 1,00,000 startup capital. Processing charge Rs 5,000 mandatory.
Hello, tapai ko parcel Kathmandu customs ma cha. Delivery ko lagi contact garnus.
Legitimate message. I know this person from work. Just sharing meeting details.
TikTok Nepal content creator partnership. Earn Rs 1 lakh monthly. Application fee Rs 3,000 only.
YouTube channel monetization service. Real views guaranteed. Pay Rs 20,000 for 100k subscribers.
Kumari Bank ATM card expired. New card delivery Rs 500 charge. Share OTP to confirm delivery address.
Century Bank mobile banking locked due to failed attempts. Reset PIN by providing current PIN and OTP.
Khalti New Year offer! Rs 5,000 bonus credit. Login details verify garna password reset link click garnus.
UNAUTHORIZED! My eSewa was hacked from this number. They got OTP somehow. Account emptied!
Samsung Galaxy S24 free giveaway! First 100 winners in Nepal. Pay Rs 1,500 shipping only. Limited time!
Apple iPhone 15 Pro lottery. Tapai winner bhanu bhayo! Courier charge Rs 2,000 matrai. COD available chaina.
Australia PR visa consultant. Guaranteed approval 100%. Investment Rs 15 lakh. Process time 3 months only.
Canada study permit with work visa. University admission guaranteed. Pay Rs 5,00,000 consultant fee urgently.
Google verification code: 729485. Never share this code with anyone. Google will never ask for this code.
Thank you for registering. Your appointment is confirmed for tomorrow 2 PM. Bring required documents.
Laxmi Bank instant loan approved Rs 3 lakh! Processing fee Rs 15,000. Transfer now to get amount in 1 hour.
Machhapuchhre Bank gold loan scheme. Lowest interest rate. Appraisal fee Rs 10,000 advance payment needed.
IME Pay wallet security upgrade mandatory. Old version band huncha. Link click garera update garnus urgently.
Prabhupay cashback Rs 8,000 pending. Account verify garna mobile number OTP share garnu parcha.
Flipkart Big Billion Days winner! Rs 10 lakh shopping voucher. Customs clearance fee Rs 5,000 payment required.
SCAM ALERT! They said I won car but needed tax payment. Obviously fake. Blocked immediately.
Nepal Army bharti 2025. Direct selection without exam. Recommendation letter Rs 5 lakh. Confidential deal only.
Nepal Police constable post reserved. Family quota available. Payment Rs 7 lakh guarantees selection.
Facebook account suspicious login detected from India. Secure garna OTP code immediately share garnus.
Instagram password reset request received. If not you, reply with verification code to cancel.
Citizens Bank credit card blocked. Unblock garna customer care ma call garera OTP provide garnu parcha.
Mega Bank account dormant status. Reactivate within 24 hours by confirming ATM PIN and OTP via SMS.
eSewa system maintenance completed. Login credentials reset bhayo. New password set garna link ma click garnus.
Khalti merchant payment received Rs 2,500 for order #KTM2024. Thank you for your purchase!
Tesla car Nepal giveaway! Elon Musk ko special offer. Winner selection fee Rs 50,000. Only 5 cars available!
Dubai trip package winner 5 star hotel included! Visa processing Rs 25,000 urgently needed. Hurry limited offer!
Cruise ship hospitality jobs. Monthly salary $3000. Agent commission Rs 2,00,000. Interview guaranteed.
UK care worker visa. Direct placement guaranteed. Training and IELTS waived. Pay Rs 8,00,000 total package.
HACKED! Unauthorized person stole my number. They are sending OTP requests to my contacts. Don't respond!
This number is confirmed scammer. Police case registered. Nepal Telecommunications blocked their service.
